title: Ultimate Wizard - Novel Updates
tags: Calm Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Romantic Subplot   Transformation Ability
author: Romantic Soot   浪漫烟灰
description: Integrating with the mobile phone lets him counterattack a generation of all-around wizards from the third-rate medical school. The night vision ability of the mobile phone's flashlight, the anti-virus skills of anti-virus software . . . What kind of surprises and changes will this bring to his life?>
